attributes.action: Tell Sunak that we do not want his selfish,ill thought out "package of support"
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to stop this ridiculous and selfish non-support and either come up with a better, well thought out package, that actually HELPS the ordinary person in the country or scrap the package that the Chancellor announced. This ridiculous package announced, is forcing debt on people and actually makes no difference to their gas and electricity bill. I want the Government tool put their heads together and come up with a "real" plan. Not one that benefits the oil companies.
attributes.background: I want the Government to debate the "support" that Sunak unveiled on 3/2/2022 and tell us  how this is going to help tackle the huge increase of gas and electricity bills for the ordinary person. I want them to explain why the public must be punished whilst oil companies make billions in profit.
